column1: Please note that these dates and times may be subject to change due to unforeseen                                                                                                                                                                                 circumstances or operational requirements, therefore the only absolute guarantee that                                                                                                                                                                                                   there is no firing is the absence of the Red Flags on the range on the day. Changes are                                                                                                                                                                                                       posted on the noticeboards next to the sentry posts on the coastal footpath.  For up to                                                                                                                                                                                                date information on training activities, or for more detail please call 01752 822516.
There is no live firing after 1500 hours on Sundays.
The red flags by day and the red lamp by night indicate that the Range is active and Live Firing is taking place.
